portfolioData.name: Kush Cultivation
portfolioData.description: An E-commerce website built for a friend. Entire website built from scratch (Ozow Payment Portal in progress). Includes its own administrative dashboard for adding/editing/deleting items from the shop. Please note I do not condone (nor do I NOT condone) the use of marijuana and related products.
